Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute near at Chicago/State
ShortDescription: #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  due to street blockage near Chicago/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  due to street blockage near Chicago/State.

Eastbound buses will operate via Chicago, LaSalle, Superior and State.

Westbound buses will operate via Chicago, State, Huron, and LaSalle.

Allow extra travel time.
